transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Ji namaskar sir, Pradeep baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ji ji, main keh raha tha, Reconn Power Solution se related sir aapka discussion hua tha Vipin ji se. To sir matlab kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Ji ji. Usme kuch bata rahe the sir aapka decide jo aapne diya hai, to aise mein main aapko call kiya aapko. Main kya dikkat aa rahi hai bataiye.
Executive: [inaudible] relevant leads nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Okay okay, relevant lead aapka nahi mil raha hai sir.
Executive: Yes.
Executive: Ek minute main check karta hu. Relevant lead mein matlab sir location aapne bataya tha aap kewal 50 kilometers range mein deal karte hain, correct?
Customer: Correct, yes.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Sir hold kijiyega main aapka lead open kar raha hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jaise main abhi aapka dekh raha hu ek buylead aapke paas hai solar panel installation chahiye Sangli Maharashtra se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo lekin [inaudible] hum Andhra Pradesh Vishakhapatnam se hai.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Vishakhapatnam ke lead to Guna Madhya Pradesh mein ek lead hai, Dadri mein hai. Sir exact 50 kilometer thoda sa area kam pad jata hai na sir is karan se waha pe exact [inaudible].
Customer: Wait wait wait, hold on. Andhra Pradesh mein Vishakhapatnam hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Maharashtra mein nahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute hold kijiyega haan. Sir total Andhra ke agar main lead dekhta hu, pure Andhra mein jo abhi lead aayi hai, Andhra mein bhi current mein lead kam hai.
Customer: Correct, that is the problem.
Executive: Hold kijiyega. Isme se product aapke solar panel installation aur solar installation yahi do product hai sir aapke only?
Customer: Haan, so basically hum domestic aur commercial solar installation karte hain.
Executive: Okay, domestic ek minute note kar leta hu. Domestic and commercial solar installation, correct? Haan, I mean so if I have to explain you ghar ke liye aur factories ya shopping mall ya hospital jo bhi hai, commercial establishments.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan uske liye hum solar installations karte hain.
Customer: Aise system par hai sir?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aap na ek baar wo link kholiye.
Executive: Kaunsa link?
Customer: Indiamart.indiamart.com
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Us product ko na thoda sa multiple naam se dalna padega usse thoda sa improvement hoga.
Executive: Solar system installation services. Isme na aap usme na google par Indiamart khola link aapne.com
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai usme aap keyword daliye. Haan isme upar search kijiye domestic solar installation services.
Customer: Buyleads mein?
Executive: Buyleads par nahi sir. Nahi nahi main.com mein hu.
Customer: Seller par nahi jana hai aapko. Rukiye main aapko ek link bhej raha hu. Link par join kijiye tab aapko clear hoga. Rukiye dijiyega. WhatsApp mein bhej dijiye.

Executive: Aapko main ek video meeting ka link bhej raha hu sir usko join kijiye aapko main thoda clear kar raha hu ki kahan se. Baki aapka sir ye product jo hai aur kuch bhi product website wagera hai to aapke khud ki?
Customer: Haan hai.
Executive: Hold kijiyega main waha se kuch product suggest karta hu dalne ke liye usko dekhiye usse kya hoga aapka benefit hoga.

Executive: Dekhiye main aapko ek link bheja hai sir video meeting ka usko join kijiye.
Customer: WhatsApp mein main bheje?
Executive: Kya kar rahe hain? Mail kholiye mail mail par.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai main usme join hota hu theek hai. Ye call cut karta hu.
Executive: Ek baar join kar lijiye phir call rahete hue taki main ek baar dekh paunga ek baar join karke. Wo system se join kijiye dekhiye.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Haan aaya aaya.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek minute hold kijiyega laga. Ek minute bas ek minute ruk jaiye.
Executive: Mic ko unmute karke ek baar boliye kuch. Awaz aa rahi hai aap waha se?
Executive: Mic ko unmute karke boliye sir ek baar. Phir phone disconnect kijiyega.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan hold kijiyega bas ek minute ruk jaiye. Haan de raha hai tabhi phone disconnect kijiyega ek second ruk jaiye bas. Main meeting wo kar raha hu phone disconnect karunga main idhar side se disconnect karunga to meeting disconnect ho jati hai.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Fewer leads in Andhra Pradesh.



Resolution:

- Executive checked customer's location and buyleads.

- Executive suggested adding multiple names to product.

- Executive sent a video meeting link to customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, solar installation, video meeting
